name: medprice
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool twelve_data.
Tool description: Financial data provided for developers, to enter the world markets. Instant access for real-time and historical data of stocks, forex, crypto, ETFs, indices, and more. Read more in [documentation](https://twelvedata.com/docs) and start [here](https://twelvedata.com/apikey).
API description: Fetches the median price (MEDPRICE) of a given financial instrument over a specified interval using the Twelve Data API.

interval.description: Interval between two consecutive points in the time series. Supported values are `1min`, `5min`, `15min`, `30min`, `45min`, `1h`, `2h`, `4h`, `1day`, `1week`, `1month`.

symbol.description: Instrument symbol such as equity, index, ETF, forex, or cryptocurrency. Examples include `AAPL`, `EUR/USD`, `ETH/BTC`.

format.description: Response format. Can be `CSV` or `JSON`. Defaults to `json`.

outputsize.description: Default `30` when no date parameters are set, otherwise set to maximum
